languages.text: "Разве ты не видишь — подобные мысли только отдаляют тебя от Неумирающего".
"Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."
languages.original_text: "Разве ты не видишь — подобные мысли только отдаляют тебя от Неумирающего".

traits.locale_text: "Can't you see? The more you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."
"Can't you see? The more you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."
"Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."
"Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."
"Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."
"Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."

languages.text: «¿Acaso no lo ve? Cuanto más profundice en esos pensamientos, más se alejará de la luz del Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso no lo ve? Cuanto más profundice en esos pensamientos, más se alejará de la luz del Inmortal».

languages.text: 「わからないのか？そんな思いに囚われれば囚われるほど、不死の者の光から遠ざかることになるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."

traits.locale_text: 「わからないのか？そんな思いに囚われれば囚われるほど、不死の者の光から遠ざかることになるんだ」

languages.text: “难道你还不明白吗？你越是在这些想法上纠缠，就会离不死之神的明光越远。”
languages.original_text: "Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."

traits.locale_text: “难道你还不明白吗？你越是在这些想法上纠缠，就会离不死之神的明光越远。”

languages.text: "Seht Ihr nicht? Je länger Ihr diesen Gedanken nachhängt, desto weiter entfernt Ihr Euch vom Licht des Todlosen."
languages.original_text: "Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."

traits.locale_text: "Seht Ihr nicht? Je länger Ihr diesen Gedanken nachhängt, desto weiter entfernt Ihr Euch vom Licht des Todlosen."

languages.text: « Vous ne voyez donc pas ? Plus vous ressassez ces pensées, plus vous vous éloignez de la lumière de l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: "Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne voyez donc pas ? Plus vous ressassez ces pensées, plus vous vous éloignez de la lumière de l'Immortel. »

languages.text: "Anlamıyor musun? Bu düşünceler aklını ne kadar meşgul ederse Ölmeyen'in ışığından da o kadar uzaklaşırsın."
languages.original_text: "Do you not see? The longer you dwell on these thoughts, the further you stray from the Undying One's light."
